items.heading: Grocery Shopping at Galleria Mall
items.body: Pick up milk, bread, eggs, Meat and vegetables from the supermarket. Check the expiration dates and make sure to get organic produce if possible.

items.heading: Call Mom
items.body: Give mom a call to check in and see how her week is going. Ask about her plans for the weekend and offer to help with anything she needs.

items.heading: Finish Project Report
items.body: Complete the project report by adding the final section on results and conclusions. Proofread the entire document for any errors and submit it by 5 PM.

items.heading: Exercise in the gym
items.body: Go for a 30-minute run in the park. If the weather is bad, do a workout video at home. Stretch afterwards to prevent any muscle soreness.
